title: Which year’s marksheet will I get after taking the improvement exam for the CBSE 12? - Quora
tags: Central Board of Secondary Education, India

response.answer_text: You will get the improvement exam mark sheet, but it depends oh your marks that which mark sheet you have to show to the college in which you are taking admission. For example, if you gave improvement for all subjects, but manage to get better scores than the previous in only some if the subjects, and less in the rest, you will have to reproduce both the mark sheets in front of the college, I.e , the old one and the improvement one. If you score better in all of them, you only need to show the improvement one. If you haven't given improvement for all subjects, you will have to show both. That's how it goes.
You would get the marksheet of Improvement Exams after you take the test. However both the marksheets are valid and you can produce either of the marksheets.
